definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]

sentences.english: Western business logic does not apply.
sentences.chinese: 西方生意經在中國不靈。

sentences.english: It was indecent of them to talk business at the funeral.
sentences.chinese: 他們在葬禮上談生意經，真不象話。

sentences.english: This is the best business idea ever. Its called supply and demand.
sentences.chinese: 這是史上最高超的生意經，稱爲供求關係。

sentences.english: It is a moneymaking proposition he wants to see you about.
sentences.chinese: 他想見你是要談生意經。

sentences.english: Here's the deal with a publishing company.
sentences.chinese: 這裏是出版公司的一些生意經。

definition: lit. deal sincerely and fairly (idiom); frank and open-minded/plain speaking/Let's talk frankly and openly between ourselves./to put one's cards on the table
lit. the river that divides Chu and Han/fig. a line that divides rival territories/the mid-line between sides on a Chinese chessboard
to judge between right and wrong/to reason things out
Long Xing Quan - "Dragon Fist" - Martial Art
lit. ten thousand strings of cash in money belt (idiom); carrying lots of money/extremely wealthy/loaded
plethora of things to tackle/multitude of loose ends/very complicated/chaotic
